name: Ramp and Pork Dumpling Filling
description: Note: for instructions on how to stuff dumpling skins, check out the recipe here....
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon Shaoxing wine or dry sherry

recipeInstructions.text: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat until smoking. Add sliced ramps and cook, stirring and tossing frequently, until lightly browned, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl. Add remaining ingredients and combine.
To make and cook dumplings, follow this recipe for homemade dumplings, starting with step 4.
